title: Keson â€” Calendrier public
css: /* ---- Hide hamburger & keep only the title ---- */ #menu__toggle, .menu__btn{display:none!important} .menu__box{position:absolute!important;top:8px!important;left:10px!important;background:transparent!important;border:0!important;box-shadow:none!important;padding:0!important;margin:0!important} .menu__box .menu-calendar-description, .menu__box .calendar-list{display:none!important} .menu__box .menu-calendar-title{display:block!important;font-weight:700!important;font-size:14px!important;line-height:1.2!important;color:#e6e6e6!important;pointer-events:none!important;opacity:.95} /* ---- Dark base ---- */ .dhx_cal_container,.dhx_cal_navline,.dhx_cal_header,.dhx_scale_holder,.dhx_scale_hour{background:#0b0f14!important;color:#e6e6e6!important} .dhx_cal_navline .dhx_cal_date{display:block!important;font-weight:600!important} /* ---- Weekday header colors ---- */ .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(1){color:#60b502!important} .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(2){color:#f8e503!important} .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(3){color:#e081f5!important} .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(4){color:#fd3f4b!important} .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(5){color:#60b502!important} .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(6){color:#f8e503!important} .dhx_cal_header .dhx_scale_bar:nth-child(7){color:#e081f5!important} /* ---- Month day-number colors per column ---- */ .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(1) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(1) .dhx_month_head a{color:#60b502!important} .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(2) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(2) .dhx_month_head a{color:#f8e503!important} .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(3) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(3) .dhx_month_head a{color:#e081f5!important} .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(4) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(4) .dhx_month_head a{color:#fd3f4b!important} .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(5) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(5) .dhx_month_head a{color:#60b502!important} .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(6) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(6) .dhx_month_head a{color:#f8e503!important} .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(7) .dhx_month_head, .dhx_month_body td:nth-child(7) .dhx_month_head a{color:#e081f5!important} /* ---- Quick-info title: show full text ---- */ .dhx_cal_qi_title{display:flex!important;flex-wrap:wrap!important;align-items:flex-start!important;gap:.4rem .75rem!important;white-space:normal!important;line-height:1.35!important;max-width:100%!important} .dhx_cal_qi_tcontent{flex:1 1 100%!important;min-width:0!important;white-space:normal!important;overflow:visible!important;height:auto!important;max-height:none!important} .dhx_cal_qi_tcontent span{white-space:inherit!important} .dhx_cal_qi_tdate{flex:0 0 auto!important;white-space:nowrap!important;opacity:.9} .dhx_cal_qi_tcontrols{position:relative!important;z-index:2!important} .dhx_cal_container{border:0!important}
